name: Ken Ta Kee
description: Just a handsome guy who love KFC. Having it for breakfast lunch and dinner. Let me introduce you to Singapore's KFC!

name: Mack Do Nah
description: 2 juicy patty topped with a bun of sesame and kiapped with mayo. That's my favourite. What's yours?

name: Bo Lui Jiak
description: I no money, please gimme some money can? I bring you around Singapore best place.
